snippet: The state news media declared President Abdel Fattah el-Sisi the first Egyptian president to attend such a service.
abstract: Egyptian Pres Abdel Fattah el-Sisi visits Coptic Christian cathedral during its Christmas Eve Mass, and state news media says he is first president of country to do so.

byline.original: By DAVID D. KIRKPATRICK and MERNA THOMAS

lead_paragraph: The state news media declared President Abdel Fattah el-Sisi the first Egyptian president to attend such a service.

headline.main: Egyptian Leader Visits Coptic Christmas Eve Service
headline.print_headline: Egyptian Leader Visits Coptic Christmas Eve Service
